attributes.action: Allow the Top Gear Stig to drive the Bugatti Veyron around the Top Gear test track
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Like millions of other viewers of Top Gear, I was disappointed to find out that the Stig couldn't drive the Bugatti Veyron around the test track. The 'fastest' car in the world, it has to be done.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
